com.dpo.centralized_restaurant.database

Class ConectorDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dpo.centralized_restaurant.database.ConectorDB

  • public class ConectorDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Links the system with the Database and executes the required queries
